Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, 0.22 is here and I love it but I can't stop thinking about one thing and is that all experiments produce result instantly. Don't get me wrong I know is the first step towards a much much bigger career mode but, will it be time-based experiments.

My idea is for example, deploy a satellite with an experiment module and begin experimenting once in orbit, but the module should consume electricy, depending on the type of experiment you're conducting. That's my other idea, be able to choose the science field you want to experiment, physics, chemistry, astronomy, science materials, electronics, etc etc.

So, this is my suggestion to the developers. I don't know if they already had thought about it or not.

I like this, another reason for electricity use and perhaps a Science experiment where you would need to obtain some resources from other planets that are used in some of the experiments! Oooh, ALIEN TECHNONLY Techtree.
